question: In which among the following countries, is the ship building industry most advanced?
explanation:
Japan is the leading nation not only in Asia but also the rest of the world in the field of engineering industry. Ship-building industry of Japan is the most advanced in the world. The Ship-building industry tend to be concentrated
in Tokyo-Yokohama and Kobe-Osaka industrial regions and to a smaller extent in north Kyushu and in the districts around Nagoya.
